Deprecated API

Contents
  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Fields
  • Deprecated Methods
Deprecated Classes
com.samskivert.util.CalendarUtil
          Use Calendars. 
com.samskivert.util.MapEntry
          As of JDK version 1.6 a replacement is available: java.util.AbstractMap.SimpleEntry. 
 

Deprecated Fields
com.samskivert.util.ResultListener.NOOP
          This cannot be type safe so don't use it. 
 

Deprecated Methods
com.samskivert.util.StringUtil.blank(String)
          use isBlank instead. 
com.samskivert.util.IntIntMap.contains(int)
          use IntIntMap.containsKey(int). 
com.samskivert.swing.TGraphics2D.getClipRect()
           
com.samskivert.util.CalendarUtil.getDaysBetween(Calendar, Calendar)
          Use Calendars.getDaysBetween(java.util.Calendar, java.util.Calendar). 
com.samskivert.util.RandomUtil.getInt(int, int)
          use getInRange(int, int). 
com.samskivert.util.CalendarUtil.getMonthsBetween(Calendar, Calendar)
          Use Calendars.getMonthsBetween(java.util.Calendar, java.util.Calendar). 
com.samskivert.util.CalendarUtil.getTimeBetween(long, long)
          Just use Math.abs(int). Duh. 
com.samskivert.velocity.InvocationContext.putAllParameters()
           
com.samskivert.util.StringUtil.replace(String, String, String)
          java.lang.String.replace() was added in 1.5 
com.samskivert.util.Interval.resetTimer()
            
com.samskivert.swing.MultiLineLabel.setAntiAliased(boolean)
          see SwingUtil.getDefaultTextAntialiasing() on how to control text antialiasing. 
com.samskivert.util.ListUtil.size(Object[])
          This is incompatible with things like clearRef(), which leave a null space. 
com.samskivert.util.CalendarUtil.zeroTime(Calendar)
          Use Calendars.
